name: Sex Rhythm: Onsen
description:
Sex Rhythm: Onsen is a rhythm game where you getting affection from girls.
3 colleagues came to your hotel, a distant hotel, for a vacation, considering how tired they are in your hands, how they will spend this vacation. Good or bad.
You, as an employee, must make clients fall in love with you with the help of mastery in massage.
And as a great lover get their affection during the game.

Features

  • 3 characters
  • 4 Locations
  • 8 Sex poses
  • Over 25 music tracks

Disclaimer: All Characters Are Over 18 Years Old.
